modName: Mysterious Items Pack - Tons of new items
summary: Will be updated with new items ! Tons of new items !
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://i.imgur.com/6lCTA1r.png[/img]
----------------------------------
this pack will be updated ! So track this mod !
For now there are 47 items in total.
----------------------------------
[size=4]**UPDATE 2.1[/size]
**Adds:
**- Shield Of Madness
**- The Chief Staff
**- The Glooming Sword 1h sword
**- Dwemer Priest Axe 2h axe
**- Auroran Sword 2h sword
**- Master Blade of the Aurorans 2h sword
**- Auroran Armor set (helm,boots,gloves,cuirass)
**- Heavy Auroran Armor set (helm,boots,gloves,cuirass)
**- Auroran npc
**- Umaril the Unfeathered
------------------------------------------------------------
How? goto->
**NEW LOCATION -> Meridias Keep -> Auroran Location and Umaril the Unfeathered, Drop chance 10 - 20% ! They do respawn every 30 days ! Best way to get them is kill them, go out of the dungeon, rest 30 days, and go back in!.
**FellglowKeep
**WollfSkull Cave
**Or again Cheat...

[size=4]*Update 1.1:[/size]
*Adds :
*- The Soul Cairn's Demolisher 2h Hammer
*- The Bloody Smasher 2h Sword

*- The Despairing 2h Hammer
*- The Blind Crown Circlet
*---------------------------------

*DeadCroneRock

Adds:

- The Hands of Inner 2h hammer

***** More to come !
----------------------------------
How?
- Go to =>
Felgow Keep
Folgunthur
Fort Dunstad
Fort Snowhawk
Gloomreach
Greywater Grotto
HaldisCairn
Kilkreath Ruins
Orotheim
RechwaterRock
SleepingTreeCamp
Tolvads Cave
Wolfskull Cave
Valthume
- And find the Stone chests in the dungeons, each Stone chest contains 1 item! somthimes there are multiple chests in one dungeon, so look carefully. Good treasure hunting !
- OR you can cheat... Use the console command typeÂ² and type into the command Help Test. There will be a container called "Chest test Mysterious Weps Cheat" AND TYPE THIS -> "Player.placeatme XXXXXX(number of the chest)" All items are in this chest
